page.title: 15CLOWNE JUNIOR SCHOOL
page.content: THIS IS A NEW BUILDING OPENED IN OCTOBER 1984.IT HAS 316 CHILDREN ON ROLL.THERE ARE 10 TEACHERS,1 HEADTEACHER,1 PART TIME CLERK,1 ANCILLARY AND ANOTHER ANCILLARY FOR HANDICAPPED CHILDREN. THERE IS A HALL,WHICH IS USED FOR ASSEMBLY,P.E. AND DRAMA.NEXT TO THE HALL IS THE DINING ROOM WHICH IS ALSO USED AS A MUSIC ROOM AND CLASSROOM. THE SCHOOL IS BUILT AROUND A PROJECT AREA THAT IS AN OPEN QUADRANGLE.THERE ARE FOUR TEACHING AREAS EACH WITH A CLASSROOM,TWO HOMEBAYS AND AN OPEN AREA.THERE IS A LIBRARY/RESOURCE AREA,CHANGING ROOMS AND A KILN ROOM. ON FRIDAY EVENING,JULY 5th A SUMMER FAYRE WAS HELD ORGANISED BY THE P.T.A. WHICH RAIED Â£500 FOR SCHOOL FUNDS. THERE WERE A VARIETY OF STALLS AND GAMES.
